body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting AutoPro, the leading Car Dealership in the area. My name is Kyle Peterson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling angry about the data management at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you provide me with your phone number so I can look up your records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you also confirm your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison, for providing that information. I will investigate the data management issue right away. Your feedback is valuable to us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Madison! Have a great day.
